website_summaries.verdict: Set of 7 hand carved ornaments that invoke a traditional Russian winter celebration.
pros: The detailed artwork in lacquered wood is high quality, and carved the style of 19th century, with modern themes that include Santa
The red, white, and blue palette adds a pop of color without being brash
cons: At 4" tall, they may get a bit lost in a big tree

customer_reviews.title: Authentic lovely wooden Russian ornaments.
customer_reviews.text: We were recently in Russia and purchased one set of these lovely wooden ornaments. After we returned home I wished we had bought more. I decided to see if I could find some Russian ornaments on Amazon and was surprised and delighted to find the same ones we purchased in Russia just weeks ago! They are handpainted with pretty colors. I can vouch for their authenticity!
customer_reviews.author: E. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE/ Best Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in LOVE with this product.! Quality amazing, previous reviews helped me to figure size. Pretty small but I did include picture comparing to the hand.. BUT it is perfect for table size X-mas Tree... Delivery was pretty fast .!!! Amazon is just amazing with notifications and letting you know of deliveries and how close they are to your house. YOU WILL NOT REGRET THIS PRODUCT..! It is so traditional and festive look... I just enjoy simply sitting next to you and just watch ...
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Package is nice. Ornaments is authentic Russian
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Package is nice. Ornaments is authentic Russian, cute and very colourful!!!! Amazing for the price! Got 4 difference packages and all of them is very good! Highly recommended, especially for family with kids!
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Shavez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These little wooden doll sets are a fine quality and beautiful. I ordered several sets in different styles/colors to make a wreath. I have gotten so many compliments on this wreath! I think I will be ordering more of these to make Christmas gifts. And they did not cost very much!! Wow.
customer_reviews.author: LEcali

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tiny.
customer_reviews.text: One of the toys caame a little damaged. Description doesn’t say how small the toys are. Very cute thou,but soooo soooooo tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Needed for a gift. Kept the broken ones and glued myself. Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen L. Donovan-holt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Paint is nice and detailed no sloppy lines. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nadya Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Those are beautifully crafted pieces
customer_reviews.text: Those are beautifully crafted pieces. I'm absolutely amazed by how well these ornaments are made and the amount of detail in painting. I ordered four sets and intend to use them as stocking stuffers and also make them part of small formal gift card presents to colleagues at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kattie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ornaments
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set of ornaments! Each is a little piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: Emkay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ornaments
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, for a very reasonable price. I also appreciate the variety of colors and designs (for lack of a better word) - I ordered five sets. I used these ornaments exclusively, to decorate artificial birch trees, and the results were most satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Ferrigno

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these little Russian ornaments. They are nice quality and arrived quickly. We choose a different country each Christmas to study and celebrate. I love to give an ornament from that country as a keepsake each year. These were perfect. Thanks for the good service.
customer_reviews.author: Marjalee Smith

customer_reviews.title: For a small tree
customer_reviews.text: The hanging loops are paper, glued to the top of the ornament. wish they were string attached to some metal loop.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Young

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured...perfect
customer_reviews.text: These ornaments arrived quickly and were exactly the same as shown. Quality is fabulous. Packaging was excellent. I’ve ordered four different sets and the two that arrived already are perfect. I will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely beautiful. I love them. Highly recommend both seller and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are well made wooden ornaments
customer_reviews.text: I collect Christmas ornaments for my young grandchildren to give to them when they are older. These ornaments are adorable and a good addition to their collections.
customer_reviews.author: Ajamma

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so well done for such an inexpensive item. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wooden ornaments
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different sets of ornaments, and my family loves them. There are Ded Moroz (Santa Claus), Snegurochka (Snow Maiden), matryoshka-style girls, snowman, Christmas/New Year tree, etc, as pictured. The ornaments are small and light enough to hang on the small tree branches. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: O&T

customer_reviews.title: They are in good quality but they are much smaller than I realized ...
customer_reviews.text: They are in good quality but they are much smaller than I realized - I can see now that there is a description of the size, but based on the picture, they did appear to be longer, so I am disappointed in the size. My bad but still disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: therebewhales

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Beautifully painted.
customer_reviews.text: They are stunning. I bought two sets for myself and one set for my Ukrainian /Russian friend. She loved them! Authentic! They add beauty to my Christmas tree!
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice ornaments
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Very well made. Beautiful ornaments. Wasn’t expecting the quality for the price, so i was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.author: book reader in NC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful art
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 and 8 year old nieces as a Christmas gift. They love them and spent time looking at the detailed figures. I'm going to buy more for next years gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable ornaments!
customer_reviews.text: I wrapped each one individually and put them in the Christmas Countdown for my grandchildren- so cute!
customer_reviews.author: GMax2

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, arrived on time and just what I wanted. Using to make an alphabet block Christmas tree
customer_reviews.author: JMO

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the ornaments I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the ornaments I purchased. Well made and exactly what I needed for my table top tree. Will most likely order additional sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These ornaments are adorable, colorful and look fabulous on my tree.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Fiorello

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of ornaments. Exactly what I was looking for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: The Christmas ornaments I bought are even more beautiful than they looked in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding service, fast and professional. The Christmas ornaments I bought are even more beautiful than they looked in the picture. Guests that I had over for Christmas remarked about them and asked if they were antiques. I did not correct them. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dysartmanach

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old, who has studied Russian since Kindergarten, was very excited when she received these. There is a little girl among the ornaments who is apparently part of the Russian Christmas stories. While I was unaware, it was significant to her. All of them immediately went to the top of the tree where she puts her favorite ornaments. The painting quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: ELL teacher

customer_reviews.title: Charming
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly beautiful little ornaments, really good quality for the money. They are a nice size, too: not miniature, but not the big heavy ones that you struggle to find a place for on the tree. I like all the charming painted detail. They look like an illustration from a children's picture book about old Russia. I look forward to giving them to my kids on St. Nicholas Day, and I have no worries they will not survive the day because they are solid wood with no extraneous parts.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These ornaments are super cute and very well made. Love each and every one of them. The only problem is that they are on a smallish side. I got sets L and M and the tallest ornament there is about 2.5" (6.5 cm) high with the shortest being 1.5" (4 cm). Still, very lovely! Highly recommend, especially for a smaller Christmas tree or a fir wreath/vase arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: sadwizard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly amazing!!!! Worth every penny. Just love it!!!!! I ordered a bunch of different ones to decorate my tree....and honestly couldnt be happier!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! One girl recommended this on Facebook, and I am happy that I ordered this. Quality amazing! Delivery was fast. It is Russian style and looks so nice! I will order more of this because they have a different styles and colors. I highly recommend this product for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tatika

customer_reviews.title: Quirky Quality
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and quirky. I love unique finds like this. These will make a perfect addition to my holiday decor.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, a little small for a big tree, but perfect for a smaller tree.
customer_reviews.author: charity whiteaker

customer_reviews.title: A little gift for Holidays
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and so cute. I got 3 sets for my friends and they were happy
customer_reviews.author: Anna N

customer_reviews.title: Cute Ornaments
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them. The little strings to hang the ornaments up are less than desirable.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Great size and price.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully painted and lovely color combination. Lightweight, but not fragile.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: The ornaments are very beautiful. They will make great gifts and I am keeping one set for myself. Packaged nicely and well made.
customer_reviews.author: IslandgirlAK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ornaments and the paint job but the little eyes to strip g or put a hook threw aren't secured well and just fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Deschamps

customer_reviews.title: Use a different hanger for these ornaments
customer_reviews.text: Great hand painted ornaments. My only issue is the hanger. The ribbon comes off easily when trying to hang them on the tree. Ornaments fall to the ground and damage the artwork.
customer_reviews.author: Brian w.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s super cute and very nice set of ornaments ! I bought two sets as one I kept for myself and second took with me to Canada as a gift !
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mary

customer_reviews.title: Well made with great colors!
customer_reviews.text: The little ornaments were beautiful and well made. I used them for place markers for a Russian dinner for our book club. Everyone took theirs home.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute little decorations for the Xmas tree. Good for a small gift .
customer_reviews.author: karina ugalde

product_meta.title: Christmas Ornaments - Set of 7 - Christmas Party - Wooden Handmade Ornaments from Russia (7, Design D)
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:7| Color:Design DSet of handmade Wooden Christmas Ornaments - 7 Pack - 

Colorful and visually attractive. 

Hand-crafted item -- color, size and/or motif may vary slightly.
feature_bullets: Hand Painted Wooden Christmas Ornaments "Christmas Party". Blue|White color. Includes 7 shaped handcrafted figures. Each figure holds different item.
Colorful and visually attractive. Excellent christmas decoration for home and office. Durable.
Highly-detailed artwork. Lacquer Finish. Made in traditional Russian technique of XIXth century.
Unique and creative gift idea. Storage gift-box included. Possible use: as hanging ornaments or as tabletop standalone figures.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
